response.overview: In 2035, where robots are commonplace and abide by the three laws of robotics, a technophobic cop investigates an apparent suicide. Suspecting that a robot may be responsible for the death, his investigation leads him to believe that humanity may be in danger.

production_companies.name: Mediastream Vierte Film GmbH & Co. Vermarktungs KG

response.title: I, Robot
